summary: The AIReactorControl class manages data transmission to the algorithm layer, processes information and includes methods for creating mind values, reacting to emotions, submitting reflex reactions, and committing inputs to teach "he" autonomous use of external functions.

details.comment: This code defines the AIReactorControl class, which handles transmitting information to the algorithm layer and processing it. It also includes methods for creating mind values, reacting to emotions, committing inputs, and submitting reflex reactions. The purpose is to teach the "he" to use external functions autonomously.
This function allows the user to commit a reactor with specified identify and data, or only with the identify parameter.
